attributes.action: stop tour operators and airlines from increasing prices during the school holidays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Travel consumers are put into a corner whereas they have no option but to either not take their children on holiday or pay the ludicrous prices that tour operators and airlines increase during the school holidays.

If parents take their children out school during the term then they are now fined, this gives them very little option.

Travel is important to any child's education and families are being priced out by tour operators and airlines.
